subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Accidents and Safety
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Over time, cycling in a peloton becomes instinctual, and a rider's bicycle become an extension of his body. When that flow is broken, reaction time is limited and crashes are likely.
snippet: Over time, cycling in a peloton becomes instinctual, and a rider's bicycle become an extension of his body. When that flow is broken, reaction time is limited and crashes are likely.
